base.$description: Base z-index for normal content flow

dropdown.$description: Z-index for dropdown menus - above normal content

metadata.useCase: Dropdown menus, select options, context menus

sticky.$description: Z-index for sticky positioned elements - above dropdowns

metadata.useCase: Sticky headers, sticky navigation, fixed toolbars

fixed.$description: Z-index for fixed positioned elements - above sticky elements

metadata.useCase: Fixed navigation bars, floating action buttons

modal-backdrop.$description: Z-index for modal backdrops - overlays page content

metadata.useCase: Modal overlays, dialog backdrops, drawer overlays

modal.$description: Z-index for modal content - above modal backdrop

popover.$description: Z-index for popovers and tooltips - above modals

toast.$description: Z-index for toast notifications - highest layer for critical messages
